column3: Cases Pending Trial from the Previous Year (Col.3)
column4: Cases Sent for Trial During the Year (Col.4)
column5: Total Cases for Trial During the Year (Col.5) = (Col.3+4)
column6: No. of Cases Withdrawn by the Govt. (Col.6)
column7: No. of Cases Disposed by Plea Bargaining (Col.7)
column9: Cases in Which Trials were Completed (Col.9) = (Col. 10+11)
column13: Cases Pending Trial at the End of the Year (Col.13) = (Col.5 NA Col.12)
